General.Name: Al Masane Al Kobra Mining Company
General.Description: Al Masane Al Kobra Mining Company engages in the production of zinc and copper concentrates, and silver and gold doré in Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. It explores for gold, silver, copper, and zinc. The company has interests in Al Masane Copper Zinc Mine, Mount Guyan Gold mine, and Moyeath Orebody Project in Saudi Arabia. It is also involved in mining of aluminium, lead, and platinum group metals; and wholesaling precious metals and gemstones. The company was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Najran, Saudi Arabia.
